MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ST7 postcode area of Alsager affecting properties in Cranberry Lane , Padston Drive and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:54am. Our engineers as well as a third party contractor have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our teams will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:10am on the 3rd December 2020.
